title: Episode 767 - Special Guest Kevin Sorbo
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by actor Kevin Sorbo to talk about moving from LA to Florida, why everyone wants to leave California, his upcoming projects including a film on Ronald Reagan, his tendency to do films that celebrate religion, th...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by actor Kevin Sorbo to talk about moving from LA to Florida, why everyone wants to leave California, his upcoming projects including a film on Ronald Reagan, his tendency to do films that celebrate religion, the time he played golf with Trump, and his frequent run-ins with the left on Twitter.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by actor Kevin Sorbo to talk about moving from LA to Florida, why everyone wants to leave California, his upcoming projects including a film on Ronald Reagan, his tendency to do films that celebrate religion, the time he played golf with Trump, and his frequent run-ins with the left on Twitter.
